comments.html: If i have two neighbors from same interface ( broadcast ) and i want to influence their routes or routes advertised to them ... is there an option ? :-[
comments.name: Rajeev

comments.html:
Google for "offset-list eigrp"

Caveat: you can add delay only to ALL updates sent or received over an interface. You cannot add delay to updates received/sent to a specific per-neighbor.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
